glsa.title: Gld: Remote execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: Gld contains several serious vulnerabilities, potentially resulting in the execution of arbitrary code as the root user.

background.p: Gld is a standalone greylisting server for Postfix.

description.p: dong-hun discovered several buffer overflows in server.c, as well as several format string vulnerabilities in cnf.c.

impact.p: An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with the permissions of the user running Gld, the default user being root.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Gld users should upgrade to the latest version:
